It only takes 4-5 hours to charge when fully charged, and work 6-8 hours. There are 8 Lighting Modes: combination, in waves, sequential, slogs, chasing/flash, slow fade, twinkle/flash and steady on. Note: the solar power is light control, the pathway lights will not light up with the daylight.

Package Included: 5 Pcs Christmas yard signs – Ginch, Whoville Pole, Cindy Lou Who, Max, Gift Box, Ginch and Whoville Pole are respectively composed of two pieces. Lovely and unique design is really suitable for Christmas decorations outdoor.
Shining at Night: This Christmas yard sign comes with two 13ft long LED colorful light strings, can twining round the yard signs to emit brilliant lights at night. The battery box is not waterproof and needs to be shielded when used outdoors on rainy days, giving you a beautiful night.The string lights use 3 AA batteries, can last 60-100H.
High-Quality Material: This Grinch yard signs are made of thickened corrugated cardboard, which is waterproof and environmentally friendly.
Easy to Assemble: This Christmas lawn decorations kit contains 4Pcs 6‚Äô‚Äô plastic stakes, 6Pcs 12‚Äô‚Äô plastic stakes, 2Pcs H-shaped support. You only need to use short stake to assemble Ginch sign and Whoville Pole together, and then use H-shaped support to fix Ginch and Whoville Pole on the lawn. Cindy Lou Who, Max and Gift Box respectively use two 12 inch plastic stakes to insert on the lawn. It’s very easy to assemble the outdoor decoration for Christmas!
Various Applications: The Xmas yard sign go extremely well with the Christmas lawn and yard decorations. You may place them in your lawn to make your Christmas merry and leave your guests and family with fascinating and enduring holiday memories.
Customer Service: If you have any ideas or suggestions about our products and services, please contact us and rest assured that we will satisfy you.

[SOLAR CHRISTMAS STAKE LIGHTS] Set of 8 exquisite outdoor solar Christmas decorations boast of 4 shapes of snowflake, reindeer, Xmas tree and stars, featuring 4-changing colors and 8 lighting modes. The outdoor garden decor will give off a vivid and warm light better decorating your yard, and further bringing you a colorful festival atmosphere!
[SOLAR POWERED & LONG WORK TIME] These Christmas pathway lights are solar powered, no need for cables or plugs. Large solar panel equipped with 800mAh high-capacity battery can work for more than 10 hours after being fully charged in sunlight. Christmas decorations outdoor yard stakes are definitely the best alternative for outdoor decorations for the sake of energy conservation. Zero electricity costs, save your money.
[EASY INSTALLATION & USE] No extra operations! Just connect these solar lights parts and stake, then insert into the ground. Please note turn on switch before both recharging and using. Really perfect solar Christmas decorations for the pathway, driveway, patio, backyard, walkway and outdoor landscape lighting to add a warm atmosphere throughout the whole night.
[HIGH QUALITY & ALL WEATHER READY] Outdoor Christmas decorations are more durable being made of ABS material with 8 sturdy stakes. All parts are IP65 waterproof enabled, suitable for both indoor and outdoor using without any worry of water ingress or damage. It works well in hot or cold weather, so you can safely put the lights outdoors, such as garden, yard, patio, pathway.
[AMAZING GIFT & AFTER SALES] These Christmas solar pathway lights are perfect Christmas gifts for mom, dad, husband, wife or friends. They will be amazed at how beautiful they look. The packaging of the solar garden decoration have been enhanced for your gift. If there are any problems with the product or any suggestions for us, please feel free to contact us.

Forblader Super long 403ft 1000 LED Christmas lights to brighten up your Christmas tree, porch, yard, garden, patios, bushes, fences, bedroom railings, Christmas, holidays, weddings, valentine‚Äôs Day, New Year, Thanksgiving, parties houses, exterior, and indoors. etc.

Features:

No Need To extend! One Set Is Enough!

‚ÄîSuper Bright, Look Bright But Not Dazzling!

‚Äî8 Lighting Modes: (1. Combination, 2. In waves, 3. Sequential, 4. Slo-Glo, 5. Chasing/flash, 6. Slow fade, 7. Twinkle/flash, 8. Steady on). From Steady on to blinking, you would find your love!

‚Äî 4 Brightness Levels, Press DIM+/Dim- via the remote controller to adjust brightness level ( 100% 75% 50% 25%).

‚ÄîTimer Function,6H on, 18H off automatically, conveniently, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly. Through the timer setting, it would light up on time every day. 

‚ÄîMemory Function, Built-in memory chip, will save your last lighting modes, no need to reset every day.

‚ÄîSafe to Touch,Come with UL588 certified & a 29V low voltage power plug. Safer and has Less power consumption.

‚ÄîIP44 Waterproof perfect for outdoor use without any damage, including heavy rain and snow.

Specifications:

Material:Copper + Plastic

Total Length: 403ft

LED light Length: 394ft/1000LED

Lead Length: 9.84ft

Color: 5600K Warm White

Waterproof Grade: IP44

Output: 29V Low Voltage

Maximum Remote Control Distance: 8m (26ft)

Package Includes:

1 x 1000 LED Xmas String Lights

1 x Remote Control

1 x Plug

1 x User Manual
„ÄêWarm White Color Changing & 8 Lighting Modes and Remote Control„ÄëIncluding (1.Combination, 2.In waves, 3.Sequential, 4.Slo-glo,5.Chasing/flash, 6.Slow fade, 7.Twinkle/flash, 8.Steady on). Both the remote control and the controller can switch modes, easy to control. „ÄêIP44 WATERPROOF OUTDOORS„ÄëPerfect for outdoor using without any damage, including heavy rain and snow. Tips: Please note that the US-Plug is NOT waterproof, please keep it away from water.
„Äê4 Brightness Levels & Timer Setting & Memory Function„ÄëOur Christmas Lights have 100%-75%-50%-25% 4 level brightness to create suitable and comfortable atmospheres for various occasions.Timer function will automatically turn on and off to help you control time( 6Hrs on, 18Hrs off). Choose a timer mode not only energy saving, but also save electricity bills. A built-in memory chip of Christmas lights indoor & outdoor will save your last time setting,no need to reset everyday.
„ÄêSafety UL Certified Plug & Easy To Shape„ÄëUL588 certified and 12V low-voltage and 29V DC Output makes the Christmas string lights more safe and reliable for chridren and pet, and Made by high-quality copper wire,These outdoor string lights won’t cause overheating, won’t be hot-to-the-touch during extended usage, and they consume less energy, making them the top environmental and money saving choice of Lights!
„ÄêWhat You Get & Quality Assurance„Äë1 x 1000 LED SUPER long string light, 1x Remote Control(include battery), 1 x User Manual and our professional & kind service include a 1-year replacement. If the product has manufacturing defects, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us, We will do our best to help you to solve it.

Super long 1000 LED Christmas String Lights
